post.body: R U feeling better today?
Good mornign from one of your not-so-new followers! :-)
when pitching newspapers, be sure to check out @themediaisdying to make sure the paper is still around
I know, but I wanted to see more of the red thunderstorm icon. :0)
Cool. Thanks for the clarification. This Wx stuff is really interesting!
mine are all from around here.
If we were to color code it, like Homeland Security does, what would be the term for the Red level?
So, do Wx-Men use "Watch" to mean severe weather or another term?
I'm finishing up the employee newsletter (short) and hopefully wroking on the cover stroy for the quarterly newsletter.
sorry, the wind really must have been blowing when i wrote that last tweet. I meant to type: Weather
What does Winter WEatehr Advisory mean, exactly?
@DrRus Well, if you used gestures to make the shape of it, I think people watching would get the idea! :-)
You can get two breakfast sandwiches for $3 at McD's still I think
Love the techy term. I think the proper name is ice melting coil roof top thingies, though :-)
I liked that review. I had heard so many negatives about it, and the wierd factor of Cruise saluting Hitler. I may be renting it
Well, that is good news, right?
@DrRus Good Morning and Thank you Wx-Man for the good news about the wind!
is surprised by this via @themediaisdying: WSJ has shut down their business technology blog.
reading a little bit about "bad apples." Totally fascinating http://tinyurl.com/8vumkh
